d:
So Nae is totally getting her own training arc at the camp. Can't wait for that. You can really tell that Hitoi draws his daughters with such love.

Sorry this took so long. I think I was being too much of a perfectionist on minor things. I'll be working on part 2 soon; the DMM doesn't releases until the end of January, so it'll be after that, so I can grab the Afterword.

I've got a morbid curiosity on potentially working on the Soushuuhen too (with new translations and redrawing the covers and fixing sfx and such), but it's just a passing shower thought for now.

The back cover is a bigger resolution than the original because I was able to recreate it piece by piece, so I increased the resolution to match the cover (it's 2x resolution). Let me know if I should've kept to the original size otherwise. I spent way too much time trying to color match for something that literally doesn't matter, so I apologize if it's not perfect. I was just a bit inspired from some other people's works.

TL/TS/Cleaning: Hakua
